DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the trial is to assess Adrenal Suppression potential when pediatric subjects are administered Product 0405 for the treatment of Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Evaluating the Adrenal Suppression Potential of Product 0405 in Pediatric Subjects With Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment medication will be administered topically, twice a day for 4 weeks.
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Atopic Dermatitis Good health with the exception of Atopic Dermatitis Percent body surface area minimum requirements Subjects who are pregnant, nursing, or planning a pregnancy
